text: Charles VII may refer to: * Charles VII of Sweden (1130–1167), actually Charles I of Sweden (1161–1167) * Charles VII of France (1403–1461), "the Victorious" * Charles VII, Holy Roman Emperor (1697–1745) * Charles III of Spain (1716–1788), and Charles VII of Naples * Carlos María de los Dolores (1848–1909), pretender to the throne of Spain, styled "Charles VII" by Carlists * Charles VII, Archduke of Austria == See also == * King Charles (disambiguation) * Charles
title: Charles VII
